name: Impostor vs Craftsman
description:
Keep an eye on your team, there is an impostor hiding us. Can you catch the imposter among crewmates fast?

Play impostor vs craftman game in imposter or crewmate mode, do tasks together, or kill them all.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap to move around the space ship, kill the crewmates, and sabotage the objects.
- When you kill everyone without getting noticed, the level is completed.

FEATURES:
- Easy controls
- 3D pixel art style.
- Nice and smooth graphics!
